body_html:
Thanks a lot, @klappradla!!!
There is one more unanswered question: about the Travis build failing. See this comment for the error message. And this one where I think I solved it. (That would be the subject of my blog post, BTW).

body:
Thanks a lot, @klappradla!!! 
There is one more unanswered question: about the Travis build failing. See [this comment](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/585/commits/b7c09e3688ef4a67bb8b6a268c2960f8a6692977#r97083178) for the error message. And [this one ](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/585#issuecomment-275074458) where I _think_ I solved it. (That would be the subject of my blog post, BTW).
